constitutionalsection.para: The treasurer shall be ineligible to the office of treasurer, for two years next after the expiration of two consecutive terms for which he was elected.

source.para: Transferred by Constitutional Convention, 1919-1920, art. IV, sec. 3;
Amended 1992, Initiative Measure No. 407; Amended 1994, Initiative Measure No. 408.
source.note: The changes made to this section by Initiative 407 in 1992 and Initiative 408 in 1994 have been omitted because of the decisions of the Nebraska Supreme Court in Duggan v. Beermann, 245 Neb. 907, 515 N.W.2d 788 (1994) and Duggan v. Beermann, 249 Neb. 411, 544 N.W.2d 68 (1996).
